title: For TY 2023-24 and before
description: This endpoint allows a developer to amend the income and expenses for a foreign property business. This submission is for either or both of Furnished Holiday Letting (FHL) in the European Economic Area (EEA) and all other foreign property submissions.Â A National Insurance number, business ID, tax year and submission ID are required.

foreignFhlEea.description: Object holding the income and expenses of the user's Furnished Holiday Lettings (FHL) in the European Economic Area (EEA) for the period.

income.description: Object holding the income details for the period.

rentAmount.description: Total rent and other income from property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

expenses.description: Object holding the expenses for the period.

premisesRunningCosts.description: Rent, rates, insurance, ground rents and other costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

repairsAndMaintenance.description: Property repairs and maintenance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

financialCosts.description: Loan interest and other financial costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

professionalFees.description: Legal, management and other professional fees. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

costOfServices.description: Cost of services provided, including wages. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

travelCosts.description: Car, van and travel costs incurred in running a property business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

other.description: Other allowable property expenses. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

consolidatedExpenses.description: The sum of all allowable expenses for the specified period. You can either submit a consolidatedExpenses value or individual expenses (premisesRunningCosts, repairsAndMaintenance, financialCosts, professionalFees, costOfServices, travelCosts, other). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignNonFhlProperty.description: Array holding the income and expenses of the user's foreign property business - excluding Furnished Holiday Lettings (FHL) in the European Economic Area (EEA) - for the period.

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. This must be an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 value.

income.description: Object holding the income details for the period.

rentAmount.description: Total rent and other income from property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: A boolean indicating whether Foreign Tax Credit Relief (FTCR) has been claimed. The value must be true or false.

premiumsOfLeaseGrant.description: Premiums received for the grant of a lease and other lump sums to possess a property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherPropertyIncome.description: Other income from property, such as rent charges and ground rents, income from letting others tip waste on your land, and income for the use of a caravan or houseboat at a fixed location. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignTaxPaidOrDeducted.description: The total amount of foreign tax paid or deducted from your income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

specialWithholdingTaxOrUkTaxPaid.description: Tax withheld (in UK Pounds) on certain payments to UK residents or UK Tax paid from rental Income (applies to non-resident landlords only). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

expenses.description: Object holding the expenses for the period.

premisesRunningCosts.description: Rent, rates, insurance, ground rents and other costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

repairsAndMaintenance.description: Property repairs and maintenance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

financialCosts.description: Loan interest and other financial costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

professionalFees.description: Legal, management and other professional fees. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

travelCosts.description: Car, van and travel costs incurred in running a property business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

costOfServices.description: Cost of services provided, including wages. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

residentialFinancialCost.description: The residential financial cost deductible from rental income (tax relief). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

broughtFwdResidentialFinancialCost.description: Amount of relief brought forward for restricted residential financial costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

other.description: Other allowable property expenses. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

consolidatedExpenses.description: The sum of all allowable expenses for the specified period. You can either submit a consolidatedExpenses value or individual expenses (premisesRunningCosts, repairsAndMaintenance, financialCosts, professionalFees, costOfServices, travelCosts, other). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
